attributes.action: move the SAS away from Hereford to a less populated area such as the Yorkshire moors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The SAS are currently based in Herefordshire. They should be moved because the area is too well known and they need to go somewhere where won't be any publicity at all as their operations are supposed to be secret. THis would mean that they could operate more effectively. THis would be much better for the country.
